name: Residence Inn Salt Lake City Cottonwood

reviews.text: We just returned from a short ski trip to Salt Lake City, Utah. We decided to stay at the Residence Inn Marriott Cottonwood because of it's location to the ski resorts, Snowbird, Alta and Solitude. We decided not to rent a car because the hotel offered shuttle service. We had to find our own transportation from the airport to the hotel. We called the hotel prior to our visit and they told us about City Express. They were very accomodating and on time about picking us up. We arrived around 10:30 pm on Sunday from a 12 hour day of flying. Upon arrival the desk clerk was very helpful and courteous. She saw that we had nine pieces of luggage (including ski and boot bags) and had the bellman bring them up to our room for us immediately. Through our whole 4 day stay, we got exceptional quick service. Whenever we needed a ride to the parking lot to pick up the UTA bus to the resorts, it was done immediately. When we needed transportation back from a long day skiing, all we had to do was call and they picked us up immediately after the UTA bus dropped us off.
reviews.title: Great Value and Great Location for Cottonwood Canyon Ski Resorts

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 3 story Hotel with 1st and second floors subject to noise so ask for top floor room!!!!!! Breakfast is very average although these two negatives should not distract the upsides to the Hotel. Nice rooms, on site laundry facilities free internet with excellent access to ski resorts at Big and Little Cottonwood Canyons and close proximity to freeway for access to SLC or other ski resorts. And its reasonably priced.
reviews.title: Location is key!

reviews.text: One other tip.......make sure if driving to the Hotel you have good directions!!!! Its slightly hard to find with minimal signage!
reviews.title: Great location for ski resort

reviews.text: If you want a central location for the ski resorts in Big and Little Cottonwood, this is the place.
reviews.title: great location for skiing

reviews.text: I stayed for a week with my wife and two kids (11 and 9 years old) in a one-bedroom. It had a kitchenette with a microwave, full size refrigerator, 2 burners and a full sink.
reviews.title: Good and bargain compared to Ski resorts

reviews.text: The family room sofa pulled out to be a queen sized bed. The kids said it was actually comfortable.
reviews.title: Great Experience
